description: From French classifier; surface analysis class + -ify.

verbs.description: classify (third-person singular simple present classifies, present participle classifying, simple past and past participle classified)

entries.meaning: to identify by or divide into classes; to categorize
examples: Should we classify "make up" as an idiom or as a phrasal verb?

entries.meaning: to declare something a secret, especially a government secret
examples: They decided to classify that information.
